did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Miscellaneous popular fiction collection, 1944-1992
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Erotic and pornographic novels in the pulp paperback format on a variety of subjects including swinging, bisexuality, sadomasochism, incest, and bestiality.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Erotic and pornographic novels in the pulp paperback format on a variety of subjects including swinging, bisexuality, sadomasochism, incest, and bestiality.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Miscellaneous Popular Fiction Collection, #7691. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: COLLECTION ARRANGEMENT
arrangement.p: Books are listed alphabetically by author. Title, publisher, series and series number if applicable (-0- if not), and date are also given.
